name: David Alejandro Perez
info: Computer Sciences Engineer with 10+ years of experience (since 2013) in building, operating, and scaling startups as a solopreneur, or working collaboratively in teams of many sizes. Possesses valuable expertise in web development, with both frontend and backend capabilities. Has a successful track record in delivering projects as an independent contractor, team member, and entrepreneur.
